moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Nf3 b6: I haven't seen this for a while, I just stick to the London idea
moves.3. Bf4 e6: I really thought about c4 here but kept within the system
moves.4. e3 Bb7 5. Nbd2 d5 6. Bd3 Bd6 7. Bg5 N: So now the bishop is going to be chased
moves.10... g5: I guess black will castle long, which is ok by me as the c file will be half open soon
moves.11. Bg3 g4: I am not too worried about this at the moment
moves.13. Nxd7 Nxd7 14. cxd5 exd5: The semi open file is to be claimed
moves.15. Rc1 O-O-O 16. a4: Time to storm myself the game is afoot
moves.16... Bxg3 17. hxg3 Kb8 18. a5 bxa5: This queens side is beginning to look exposed
moves.20... hxg3 21. Qxg3 Nf6 22. Nxa5 Rdg8 23: I am going to bring more pressure on the bishop
moves.24... Qd7 25. g3: Black cannot play the tempting q h3 because of qxp check then q x b mate
moves.27. Rb3: however the bishop is a gonner now
moves.27... Rh5h2: Again looking to bring the queen to h3
moves.28. Nxb7 Ka8 29. Nc5: Q h3 is now met by qxp mate if black had  moved to c8 I would have B f5 check  and it is game over
moves.29... Rh2h1+ 30. Qxh1 Rxh1+ 31. Kxh1 Qh3: I amplanning on moving my knight to a6 trapping the king
